alert.note: Alert for Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 8:18PM CDT until July 28 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Vernon County in southwestern Wisconsin... Northern Richland County in southwestern Wisconsin... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 817 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cashton, or 12 miles northeast of Viroqua, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... La Farge around 835 PM CDT. Richland Center around 905 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include County Roads D And N N, Wildcat Mountain State Park, Bartons Corners, Ithaca, Loyd, Bunker Hill and Highway 58 And County B. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
